name: Sage Audio
tag_list: online-mastering, mastering-online, music-mastering, mastering-music, online-mastering-studio, mastering-service-online, cd-mastering, nashville-mastering-studio, song-mastering
overview:
Sage Audio is a professional mastering studio located on Music Row in Nashville, TN. We specialize in providing high fidelity music mastering services to local and remote artists. In addition we also offer mixing services. Our studio design, excellent mastering equipment, and experience allow us to provide outstanding audio mastering services at affordable rates.

We offer a free mastering sample for new artists, and provide a convenient web based file transfer system to support our remote mastering clients. Through this system clients can upload their songs, send us notes and references, preview their finished master for free, and download the final lossless master. In addition clients can communicate directly with our engineers throughout the process using their account. Once you are satisfied with the final master you can purchase and download the full track instantly through your online mastering account.
